TextLibrary.Text: That's it. All clear. Apart from the odd ship or two, there's no sign of any Soulless fleet.
That's it. All clear. Apart from the odd ship or two, there's no sign of any Soulless fleet.
Maybe we need to go back to Acheron. I'm sure that creature I met can help us.
Maybe we need to go back to Acheron. I'm sure that creature I met can help us.
The creature on Acheron is very old and powerful. Take care. My people have many tales of spirits who live on the rim. Not all of them can be trusted.
The creature on Acheron is very old and powerful. Take care. My people have many tales of spirits who live on the rim. Not all of them can be trusted.
Trustworthy or not, we're running out of options. Set course for Acheron Prime.
Trustworthy or not, we're running out of options. Set course for Acheron Prime.
